Package main.item

Class Item

java.lang.Object
main.item.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Food, Potion
public abstract class Item extends Object implements Purchasable
Item class. Represents an item that the player can interact with.

    • setBuyAndSellPrices

      public void setBuyAndSellPrices(int BuyPrice)
      Description copied from interface: Purchasable
      Sets the buy and sell price of an item. The sell price is determined by the buy price.
      Specified by:
      setBuyAndSellPrices in interface Purchasable
